field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓not exists(select 1 from ctgt20 b where @@table.ngay_lct = b.ngay_lct and @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct and @@table.so_seri = b.so_seri and @@table.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and @@table.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and @@table.ma_thue = b.ma_thue and b.ma_ct = @voucherID and status = '1') and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from ctgt20 b where @@table.ngay_lct = b.ngay_lct and @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct and @@table.so_seri = b.so_seri and @@table.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and @@table.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and @@table.ma_thue = b.ma_thue and b.ma_ct = @voucherID and status = '1') and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: ma_mau_ct
field.check: ma_mau_ct <> '' and ma_mau_ct not in (select ma_mau_ct from dmmauct)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh <> '' and ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh where kh_yn = '1')

field.name: ma_nt
field.check: ma_nt not in (select ma_nt from dmnt)

field.name: ma_thue
field.check: ma_thue not in (select ma_thue from dmthue)

field.name: tk_thue_co
field.check: tk_thue_co not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: tk_du
field.check: tk_du <> '' and tk_du not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_nvbh
field.check: ma_nvbh <> '' and ma_nvbh not in (select ma_nvbh from dmnvbh)

field.name: ma_kho
field.check: ma_kho <> '' and not exists(select 1 from dmkho b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.ma_kho = b.ma_kho)

field.name: ma_vv
field.check: ma_vv <> '' and ma_vv not in (select ma_vv from dmvv)

field.name: ma_kh2
field.check: ma_kh <> '' and ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)

field.name: t_tien2
field.insertValue: case when a.ma_nt = '' then a.t_tien_nt2 else round(a.t_tien_nt2 * a.ty_gia, @round) end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = '' then b.t_tien_nt2 else round(b.t_tien_nt2 * b.ty_gia, @round) end

field.name: t_thue
field.insertValue: case when a.ma_nt = '' then a.t_thue_nt else round(a.t_thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @round) end
field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = '' then b.t_thue_nt else round(b.t_thue_nt * b.ty_gia, @round) end

text.v: Cập nhật hóa đơn GTGT đầu ra

processing.text: declare @q nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8), @locked nvarchar(512) declare @baseCurrency varchar(8), @count int, @m int, @round int select @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @round = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID from dmstt select @m = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'wrkcolumns' and column_name = 'so_ct' if @admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'OutputVATEntry', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end select @count = count(*) from @@table select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from @@table -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; &CommandCheckTaxCodeImport; update @@table set so_ct = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_ct))) + ltrim(so_ct), ngay_lct = case when a.ngay_lct is null then a.ngay_ct else a.ngay_lct end, ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, ten_kh = case when a.ten_kh <> '' then a.ten_kh else isnull(rtrim(b.ten_kh), '') end, thue_suat = c.thue_suat, tk_thue_co = case when a.tk_thue_co = '' then isnull(rtrim(c.tk_thue_co), '') else rtrim(a.tk_thue_co) end from @@table a left join dmkh b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join dmthue c on a.ma_thue = c.ma_thue -- Checking &Checking; -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from ctgt20 b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_lct = b.ngay_lct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.so_seri = b.so_seri and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue and b.ma_ct = @voucherID) select @field = 'ma_dvcs' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00002' from @@table where @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1) &w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table where @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1) &Error; end &EndErrorMode; update @@table set stt_rec = b.stt_rec from @@table a join (select c.ma_dvcs, c.ngay_lct, c.so_ct, c.so_seri, c.ma_mau_ct, c.ma_so_thue, c.ma_thue, min(c.stt_rec) as stt_rec from ctgt20 c join @@table d on c.ma_dvcs = d.ma_dvcs and c.ngay_lct = d.ngay_lct and c.so_ct = d.so_ct and c.so_seri = d.so_seri and c.ma_mau_ct = d.ma_mau_ct and c.ma_so_thue = d.ma_so_thue and c.ma_thue = d.ma_thue where c.ma_ct = @voucherID and c.status = '1' group by c.ma_dvcs, c.ngay_lct, c.so_ct, c.so_seri, c.ma_mau_ct, c.ma_so_thue, c.ma_thue) b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_lct = b.ngay_lct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.so_seri = b.so_seri and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue -- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join ctgt20 b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_lct = b.ngay_lct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.so_seri = b.so_seri and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_lct = b.ngay_lct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.so_seri = b.so_seri and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue) -- Insert if @count > 0 begin exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @user, '@@table', 'stt_rec', 'stt' update @@table set ma_nt = '', ty_gia = 0 where ma_nt = @baseCurrency &Inserting; end -- Update if @type = '1' begin update #k set ma_nt = '', ty_gia = 0 where ma_nt = @baseCurrency update ctgt20 set @@list from ctgt20 a, #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_lct = b.ngay_lct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.so_seri = b.so_seri and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue and status = '1' end
